channel.title: MUTANTdragon on DillonBaird.io
channel.description: Recent content in MUTANTdragon on DillonBaird.io

item.title: A Developer's Journey With Spacial Computing
item.description: When I first slid on the Apple Vision Pro, I was bracing myself for another overhyped gadget. Instead, what I encountered was a transformative leap into the future of digital interaction. This wasn’t merely a high-tech toy; it was a tool that seamlessly wove itself into my daily coding rituals, shattering my preconceived limits of what technology could achieve. From that moment, I was hooked—immersed in a mixed reality that felt both groundbreaking and surprisingly intuitive.

item.title: Bringing Outer Space UI/UX Down To Earth
item.description: What if I could be a part of helping make humans a spacefaring species? As a software engineer, there seemed to be no suitable answer that would take me closer to this big dream. That is until I noticed an open position for a Frontend Engineer at SpaceX and decided to apply. While my initial attempt to join the SpaceX team fell short, I decided not to abandon my dream. Instead, I embarked on an ambitious solo project, intending to refine my skills and reapply in the future.

item.title: Software Developer Recreates SpaceX's Crew Dragon UI
item.description: San Diego, CA - Software developer Dillon Baird has successfully recreated the user interface (UI) of SpaceX’s Crew Dragon spacecraft in just 60 days. The project, called “MUTANTdragon,” was a personal challenge for Baird to improve his skills and potentially impress the team at SpaceX. “I’m a big fan of SpaceX and the incredible work they are doing to advance space exploration,” said Baird. “I wanted to challenge myself and see if I could recreate their Crew Dragon UI in a short amount of time, using only my own skills and resources.

item.title: Recreating the SpaceX Crew Dragon UI in 60 Days
item.description: One developer’s challenge to recreate a conceptual UI/software stack and/with a hardware simulator for the Crew Dragon , in 60 days.
